name: Dried Sagelore Fruit
description: Upon use, immediately recovers 3 Technique Points for the team.
story:
Grove Scholars can weave knowledge into the sacred tree, and with Cerces' permission, they may harvest its fruit that houses condensed wisdom. Each of these Titan-blessed seeds holds information weightier than a library. But even so, like any other information vessel, the seeds have a limited shelf life as carriers of knowledge. Fortunately, their shelf life as food far outlasts that as a knowledge vessel â€” thus, this delicious dried fruit was born.

"Wait... if I could get a fresh one to eat, would I become the smartest person in Okhema overnight?"
"Someone tried that once, and they went mad. You can't pour a whole lake into a water bowl."
